entry.title: Mac install pip
entry.content: Mac å®‰è£… pip1. Install easy_install 1curl https://bootstrap.pypa.io/ez_setup.py -o - | sudo python 2. easy_install pip 1sudo easy_install pip 3. Now, you could install external modules. 1pip install pygerrit2 if you see error like: Exception:Traceback (most recent call last): File â€œ/Library/Python/2.7/site-packages/pip-9.0.1-py2.7.egg/pip/basecommand.pyâ€, line 215, in main status = self.run(options, args) File â€œ/Library/Python/2.7/site-packages/pip-9.0.1-py2.7.egg/pip/commands/install.pyâ€, line 342, in run prefix=options.prefix_path, File â€œ/Library/Python/2.7/site-packages/pip-9.0.1-py2.7.egg/pip/req/req_set.pyâ€, line 784, in install **kwargs File â€œ/Library/Python/2.7/site-packages/pip-9.0.1-py2.7.egg/pip/req/req_install.pyâ€, line 851, in install self.move_wheel_files(self.source_dir, root=root, prefix=prefix) File â€œ/Library/Python/2.7/site-packages/pip-9.0.1-py2.7.egg/pip/req/req_install.pyâ€, line 1064, in move_wheel_files isolated=self.isolated, File â€œ/Library/Python/2.7/site-packages/pip-9.0.1-py2.7.egg/pip/wheel.pyâ€, line 345, in move_wheel_files clobber(source, lib_dir, True) File â€œ/Library/Python/2.7/site-packages/pip-9.0.1-py2.7.egg/pip/wheel.pyâ€, line 316, in clobber ensure_dir(destdir) File â€œ/Library/Python/2.7/site-packages/pip-9.0.1-py2.7.egg/pip/utils/init.pyâ€, line 83, in ensure_dir os.makedirs(path) File â€œ/System/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/lib/python2.7/os.pyâ€, line 157, in makedirs mkdir(name, mode)OSError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: â€˜/Library/Python/2.7/site-packages/pbrâ€™ 1sudo pip install pygerrit2

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment æ ‡ç­¾å’Œåˆ†ç±»12345678---title: My New Postdate: 2017-07-09 18:57:13tags: - tag1 - tag2categories: xxx--- å†’å·åŽé¢è¦æœ‰ç©ºæ ¼ â€“å¥½åƒä¸ä¸€å®šè¦æœ‰ç©ºæ ¼ å¯ä»¥æ²¡æœ‰åº”è¯¥åœ¨ â€”ä¹‹ä¸Šï¼Œâ€”ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯é¡µé¢å†…å®¹ä»¤ï¼šè¦æ·»åŠ tagså’Œcategoriesé¡µé¢ï¼›ä¸”ä¸»é¢˜çš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶å’Œç«™ç‚¹çš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶tagså’Œcategoriesçš„æ³¨é‡Šè¦æ‰“å¼€ æ·»åŠ æ ‡ç­¾1$ hexo new page tags ç¡®è®¤ç«™ç‚¹é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶é‡Œæœ‰tag_dir: tagsç¡®è®¤ä¸»é¢˜é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶é‡Œæœ‰tags: /tagsç¼–è¾‘ç«™ç‚¹çš„source/tags/index.mdï¼Œæ·»åŠ 1234title: tagsdate: 2017-07-09 18:39:01type: "tags"comments: false æ·»åŠ åˆ†ç±»1$ hexo new page categories ç¡®è®¤ç«™ç‚¹é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶é‡Œæœ‰category_dir: categoriesç¡®è®¤ä¸»é¢˜é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶é‡Œæœ‰categories: /categoriesç¼–è¾‘ç«™ç‚¹çš„source/categories/index.mdï¼Œæ·»åŠ 1234title: categoriesdate: 2017-07-09 18:47:06type: "categories"comments: false
